name: simple-static-site
description: A simple static site with blog support

scripts.serve: node -e "const http = require('http'); const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); http.createServer((req, res) => { const filePath = path.join(__dirname, 'dist', req.url === '/' ? 'index.html' : req.url); fs.readFile(filePath, (err, data) => { if (err) { res.writeHead(404); res.end('File not found'); } else { res.end(data); } }); }).listen(3000, () => console.log('Server running at http://localhost:3000/'));"
